metadata.title: CVE-2021-37501 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in HDFGroup hdf5-h5dump 1.12.0 through 1.13.0allows attackers to cause a denial of service via h5tools_str_sprint in/hdf5/tools/lib/h5tools_str.c.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
